sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ReactCardFlip from "react-card-flip"; import './LoadCompanyProfile.css' import { Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; //Loading the company profile const LoadCompanyProfile = ({ beta, ceo, changes, changesPercentage, companyName, description, exchange, image, industry, lastDiv, mktCap, price, range, sector, volAvg, website }) => { //Convert changesPercent given as (-0.11%) to -0.11 let percent = changesPercentage.replace(/[()]/g, ''); percent = percent.replace('%', ''); //State to flip the React Card const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => { setIsFlipped(!isFlipped); }; return (
{companyName} Profile
Company Name: {companyName} Industry: {industry} Sector: {sector} CEO: {ceo} Description: {description} Price: $ {price} Range: $ {range} Exchange: {exchange} Changes: {changes} Changes Percentage: {changesPercentage} Beta: {beta} Market Capitalization: {mktCap} Latest Dividend: {lastDiv} Average Volume: {volAvg} Website: {website}
) } export default LoadCompanyProfile;
